hiveArticle.title: Beautiful Purple
hiveArticle.body:
Our eyes will move from beauty, especially if you see a beautiful woman. Here I also can not lie with what I see, the beautiful flower caught my attention. I do not know the name of this flower, Its size is very small, I found out on the roadside in my travels. Looks great because I use a macro lens, on my smartphone's camera, hope you like it. ![IMG_20170630_135842.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdwwW8T6t6fz6SFTvnAWp7ooG4p7iXGXqJEpUPukgwK7m/IMG_20170630_135842.jpg) ![IMG_20170630_135832.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWtTbpLimx3vjRqea1CVXk8MA6mDPqVgM6JX7aMXaEYyD/IMG_20170630_135832.jpg) ![IMG_20170630_135802.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmU9tsRcHcbQ6xHpjf4tJbXGqSyU7JSUJfKBG1SfLV94Hf/IMG_20170630_135802.jpg) *** ##
Follow Me : @ejhaasteem
